title: FK Hodonín
text:
FK Hodonín is a <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> club located in the town of <a href="Hodon%C3%ADn">Hodonín</a>. It currently plays in the <a href="Czech%20Fourth%20Division">Czech Fourth Division</a>.
Hodonín won promotion to the <a href="Moravian%E2%80%93Silesian%20Football%20League">Moravian–Silesian Football League</a> in 2017, passing rivals <a href="%C4%8CSK%20Uhersk%C3%BD%20Brod">ČSK Uherský Brod</a> on the last day of the season with a 12–2 win over Bystřice nad Pernštejnem to finish first in group D of the <a href="Czech%20Fourth%20Division">Czech Fourth Division</a>. In 2019 the club was relegated to the <a href="Czech%20Fourth%20Division">Czech Fourth Division</a>.
Czech Cup.
The team reached the third round of the Czech Cup in <a href="2017%E2%80%9318%20Czech%20Cup">2017–18</a>, defeating <a href="MFK%20V%C3%ADtkovice">Vítkovice</a> 1–0 in the second round.
